data.title: Apps Like Pinterest, Twitter, Netflix See Surge In Downloads During Coronavirus
data.text: With few entertainment options during the coronavirus pandemic, locked-down mobile users around the globe turned to app stores.

data.title: The Rise Of Twitter
data.text: Twitter was born in 2006 out of the remnants of a failed San Francisco Internet radio startup.

data.title: Twitter removes image from Trump tweet for violating copyright policy
data.text: The president's tweet included a photo of himself taken for The New York Times in 2015.
